meanings.sent1: The malihinis were excited to explore the island.
meanings.sent2: The malihinis asked for directions to the nearest beach.
meanings.sent3: The malihinis accidentally wandered into a local festival.
meanings.sent4: The malihinis stood out in the crowd like colorful birds.
meanings.sent5: The malihinis brought a fresh energy to the small town.

meanings.definition: relating to or characteristic of newcomers or strangers
meanings.sent1: The warm welcome sign was a malihinis gesture.
meanings.sent2: The malihinis cuisine featured flavors from around the world.
meanings.sent3: The malihinis decorations added a touch of mystery to the party.
meanings.sent4: The malihinis language sounded like music to the locals' ears.
meanings.sent5: The malihinis customs blended beautifully with the traditional ones.
